text: CLOSE In its Breakthrough Entertainers of 2017 feature, AP highlights recording artist SZA whose debut album “ Ctrl ” impressed critics and fans. ( Dec. 14 ) AP SZA : “ Ctrl ” ( Photo : Contributed ) With the Grammy Awards airing 7 : 30 p. m. tonight on CBS, it's a good time to get to know nominee SZA, a New Jersey native who may take home an award ( or two, three, four... ) during the celebration at Madison Square Garden. Here are six things to know about SZA. ( And here's a bonus seventh : How to pronounce SZA : siz - uh! ) Follow live with us : Live - Tweeting the Grammy's (
